points.description: Observation: Multiple active side channels, backwaters, and oxbows exchange flow during moderate floods. Field photos confirm inundation paths. Criteria: Several off-channel features connected at ~1-2 year stage; pattern resembles historical complexity.

Observation: Some side channels remain but several are truncated by berms or levees. Connectivity occurs only in parts of the reach. Criteria: Partial complexity. Some features are disconnected at moderate floods.
Observation: Only a small backwater remains. Most historic features are isolated or filled. Criteria: Most side channels lost or isolated. Minimal diversity of floodplain features.

Observation: Both banks are leveed or the reach is straightened and dredged. No off-channel areas remain despite historical evidence. Criteria: Drastically simplified or leveed. No functional off-channel areas.
